switch.title: Ashmem
switch.desc: 只在运行某些图形界面程序出现问题时，才使用此补丁
switch.set: if [ -e "$rootfs/usr/local/lib/libandroid-shmem.so" ];then echo "1" else $TOOLKIT/bin/cli.sh check_rootfs cp $TOOLKIT/lib/libandroid-shmem.so $rootfs/usr/local/lib/ fi

action.title: debian-groupaddon
action.desc: 只在登录终端提示缺少group组时，才使用此补丁

switch.title: PROOT_NO_SECOMP
switch.set: if [[ "$(cat $CONFIG_DIR/patch_proot-seccomp.config)" != "1" ]] then sed -i '14i\PROOT_NO_SECCOMP=1' $START_DIR/shell_init.sh echo "1">$CONFIG_DIR/patch_proot-seccomp.config else echo "">/dev/null fi
